summary: Tested LoginPage and LegalPage features. Full-width header/footer verified, all 5 legal sections present (Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, Refund Policy, Cookie Policy, GDPR). Login with email/password works correctly with redirect to dashboard. Backend auth APIs all passing (13/13 tests).

issues: Console warning: chart width/height -1 - minor Recharts sizing issue on initial load

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/health - returns healthy status (200 OK)
Backend: POST /api/auth/login - valid credentials returns token and user (200 OK)
Backend: POST /api/auth/login - invalid password returns 401
Backend: POST /api/auth/login - non-existent user returns 401
Backend: POST /api/auth/login - missing email returns 422 validation error
Backend: POST /api/auth/login - missing password returns 422 validation error
Backend: GET /api/auth/me - valid token returns user data (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/auth/me - no token returns 401
Backend: GET /api/auth/me - invalid token returns 401
Backend: POST /api/auth/register - new user registration (200 OK)
Backend: POST /api/auth/register - duplicate email returns 400
Backend: POST /api/auth/logout - clears session (200 OK)
Backend: Token becomes invalid after logout (401)
Frontend: LoginPage loads with data-testid='login-page'
Frontend: Full-width header (1920px) with logo and 4 navigation items
Frontend: Full-width footer (1920px) with all 5 legal links
Frontend: Privacy Policy link navigates to /legal#privacy
Frontend: Terms of Service link navigates to /legal#terms
Frontend: Refund Policy link navigates to /legal#refund
Frontend: Cookie Policy link navigates to /legal#cookies
Frontend: GDPR Compliance link navigates to /legal#gdpr
Frontend: Email input (data-testid='email-input') present
Frontend: Password field appears after email submission
Frontend: Google login button (data-testid='google-login-btn') present
Frontend: Login flow redirects to /app/dashboard
Frontend: LegalPage has all 5 sections with content
Frontend: Navigation from footer legal links works correctly
critical_code_review_comments: LoginPage has proper data-testid attributes for testing
Footer contains all required legal links (Privacy, Terms, Refund, Cookies, GDPR)
LegalPage has comprehensive content for all 5 policy sections
Auth flow properly validates credentials and returns appropriate error codes
Dark theme implemented consistently across LoginPage and LegalPage

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All UI elements present and functional

context_for_next_testing_agent: LoginPage and LegalPage are fully functional. All legal compliance links present in footer. Email/password login works with redirect to dashboard. Backend auth APIs all working. Test credentials: testuser@test.com / test123456

full_width_header.elements: Logo, Meet EKA-AI, Pricing, Contact sales, Try EKA-AI button

full_width_footer.sections: Brand info, Product links, Company links, Legal links, Trust badges, Social links

login_with_email_password.flow: Enter email → Continue → Enter password → Sign in → Redirects to /app/dashboard

legal_page.features: Quick navigation, hash-based scrolling, Contact Us section, Back to Home link
